title: The North = El Norte

description: A moving look at war-torn Guatemala and the plight of illegal aliens through the eyes of a young brother and sister. They move 'north' to America, for a life of freedom and happiness but as illegal immigrants their dreams quickly crumble and it will take everything they've got to survive the harsh reality of city life. Cast includes Zaide Silvia Gutierrez, David Villalpando, Ernesto Gomez Cruz, and Alicia del Lago.
